Summary: 3 corners were white and one was red in the centre was a faint blue light
divs: Sighting Detailsi was with my family in the back of the car and when i first saw it i had this strange feeling that it was not just another plane. i wasn't it flew over the car and i saw that there was 3 other ones where i was heading towards. it was disguised as a plane and the top-right-left corners were white "lights" and the bottom one was a blinking red "light". when it went towards the other ones, it stoped for about 3 seconds and they all just splitted up and "flew" at a really high speed. afterwards i felt really wierd like something is staring at me. i lost sight of these objects when they went behind some trees and one went towards a star... i think it was a star. it was like about two days ago or so.
trends: There have been no other sightings in i have no clue
This sighting has never been favorited.
